lead_paragraph: SINGAPORE, Dec. 31 -- Attention in many quarters is being directed to the importance of the Netherlands Indies in the Allied prosecution of the war in the Far East against Japan.
abstract: Batavia mil and naval qrs ask Brit-U S reinforcements to make N I base for Allied offensive
snippet: SINGAPORE, Dec. 31 -- Attention in many quarters is being directed to the importance of the Netherlands Indies in the Allied prosecution of the war in the Far East against Japan....

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES
